c:Label.tooltip: Title of the project

Please explain your proposed project in as much detail as required to assist understanding. This will help to form outlines, the scope and success criteria for the project. Detail also any switching of SKUs, any specific artwork changes (unique coding, different designs etc). PLEASE be explicit about what is changing and why. If delisting please list the SKUs as well or attach a separate file containing the SKU list (BASIS/SAP/BAP codes)
Please select all markets where this product is sold
Please select the relevant Promotion Type: Theme (e.g. Share a Coke), Standard, Promo (e.g. 3+1, Price Mark)
Please note the NIM commitment will be only on the first despatch date from warehouse
Please enter the name of the DF Approver who is an Associate Director level or above
Please note a confirmation email will be sent to the DF Approver Email. If more than one email please use a ; to separate these with the following format: abc@email.com; xyz@email.com

c:Label.text: *Has the affected brand owner agreed to this project/change?

c:Label.tooltip: Please note a confirmation email will be sent to the Brand Owner Email. If more than one email please use a ; to separate these with the following format: abc@email.com; xyz@email.com

c:Label.text: *Date of First/Last (if Delist) Despatches from CCEP Warehouses
c:Label.tooltip: Please select a Friday date only
Please note the NIM commitment will be only on the first despatch date from warehouse

c:Label.text: *Did this product achieve its volumes and targets?
*What countries was this product launched in?
*Is a new Finished Goods SKU code needed?
*The initiator assumes the responsibility to confirm the availability of the forecast with Demand Planning 10 weeks prior to the first despatch from CCEP Warehouses
*Please explain why you do not agree
Technical file/ Trade Registration / Line Forms Date?
c:Label.tooltip: When is the Technical file/ Trade Registration/ Line Form required to set up codes with the customer (EAN codes / finished case good codes)?

c:Label.text: *Is a temporary Finished Goods SKU code needed?
*Will existing Finished Goods SKU codes be impacted by this DF?
*Select Finished Goods SKU codes impacted by the DF
c:Label.tooltip: Please enter SAP SKU / BAP codes which are impacted by the project unless new SKU required as part of scope.

Button.text: Select Finished Goods SKU’s codes impacted by the DF

c:Label.text: *Please provide details about the new pack

c:Label.tooltip: Please select all brands in scope of this project. If this is a New Product Development please select Other and provide details on the new brand.
Please enter all flavours in scope of this project. If this is a New Product Development please select Otherand provide details on the new flavour.
Please enter all containers in scope of this project
Please enter all pack sizes in scope of this project.
Please select all that apply

c:Label.text: Please add all new Product details for this DF
c:Label.tooltip: Please note you can manually type in values for each column if the value you are looking for is not available in the drop-down menu

c:Label.text: *SKUs that will be impacted by this new pack?
c:Label.tooltip: Please select all that apply

Button.text: Select SKUs that will be impacted by this new pack?

c:Label.text: *Please enter all Volumes in Unit Cases
c:Label.tooltip: Please enter Volumes with the following format: e.g. 1000

c:Label.text: *Please enter all Volumes in Unit Cases
c:Label.tooltip: Please enter Volumes with the following format: e.g. 1000

c:Label.text: Select Raw Material codes impacted by the DF

c:Label.tooltip: Please specify Incremental Volume details
Finished Goods SKU codes impacted by this product and likely cannibalisation rates as a %

c:Label.text: *Select Finished Goods SKU codes impacted by the cannibalisation and enter the Cannibalisation rate as a percentage
c:Label.tooltip: Please enter SAP SKU / BAP codes which are impacted by the project unless new SKU required as part of scope.

Button.text: Select Finished Goods SKU codes impacted by the cannibalisation

c:Label.tooltip: If palletisation is to be changed please provide details

c:Label.text: *Please provide the names of the customer(s)
c:Label.tooltip: Where there are Residual cases left over from a customer bespoke (unique) promotion please state alternative commercial plans

c:Label.text: *List Customers not to be included in the Promotion
c:Label.tooltip: List any customers excluded from Promotion that require standard pack (specifically for on pack promotions)

c:Label.text: *Please select all Materials which are impacted
*In the event of raw material write off (RMWO), which department will cover the costs
Please add comments about the RMWO costs

c:Label.tooltip: Fixed Volume, Fixed Period, Hard Stop (materials and/or finished case goods), On-going. This is key for Residual and Raw Material Write Off Calculations
Can current packaging be mixed with new to minimise Raw Material Write Off?

c:Label.text: *Please enter Mixing of Packaging Guideline details

c:Label.tooltip: Please select all relevant teams

c:Label.text: *If trials are required, who will be the budget holder for the trials?
c:Label.tooltip: Who is the recommended budget holder for the trials?

c:Label.text: Supplier Name for Supply Chain project

c:Label.tooltip: Including regional splits/ specific sites
Number of trials and criteria for T1/T2 combinations

c:Label.text: *Will Charterhouse be involved in this project (e.g. Shroud or Display Unit)
Please attach the files regarding the assembly manual for display, technical drawing and pictures
